room_title: Escape room "The Purge" by Panic Escape Room in Chicago
room_address: 1000 W Spring St South Elgin, IL 60177
room_description:
The nation's annual "purge" is in its final hour...where all crime including MURDER is legal! Your group has managed to find temporary refuge in a local voodoo shop, but guess who's found you!
You can't go the way you came in! Escape through the rear of the store down through the alleyway, there must be someplace else to wait it out safely!
